testcase.name: verifyAddRemoveItemFromCart

failure.message: The following asserts failed: User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt name does not match the expected name. expected [Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt] but found [Sauce Labs Bike Light], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt description does not match the expected description. expected [Get your testing superhero on with the Sauce Labs bolt T-shirt. From American Apparel, 100% ringspun combed cotton, heather gray with red bolt.] but found [A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.], User : 'problem_user',The product: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt price does not match the expected price. expected [$15.99] but found [$9.99], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket name does not match the expected name. expected [Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket] but found [Sauce Labs Bike Light], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket description does not match the expected description. expected [It's not every day that you come across a midweight quarter-zip fleece jacket capable of handling everything from a relaxing day outdoors to a busy day at the office.] but found [A red light isn't the desired state in testing but it sure helps when riding your bike at night. Water-resistant with 3 lighting modes, 1 AAA battery included.], User : 'problem_user',The product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket price does not match the expected price. expected [$49.99] but found [$9.99], User : 'problem_user', The product: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red), Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) name does not match the expected name. expected [Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)] but found [Sauce Labs Onesie], User : 'problem_user', The product: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) description does not match the expected description. expected [This classic Sauce Labs t-shirt is perfect to wear when cozying up to your keyboard to automate a few tests. Super-soft and comfy ringspun combed cotton.] but found [Rib snap infant onesie for the junior automation engineer in development. Reinforced 3-snap bottom closure, two-needle hemmed sleeved and bottom won't unravel.], User : 'problem_user',The product: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red) price does not match the expected price. expected [$15.99] but found [$7.99], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Backpack, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product Sauce Labs Backpack was not removed from the cart. expected [false] but found [true], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Bike Light, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product Sauce Labs Bike Light was not removed from the cart. expected [false] but found [true], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Bolt T-Shirt, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Fleece Jacket, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product: Sauce Labs Onesie, Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false], User : 'problem_user', The product Sauce Labs Onesie was not removed from the cart. expected [false] but found [true], User : 'problem_user', The product: Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red), Add to Cart test failed: badge count did not decrease expected [true] but found [false]
